text: Salignac, Gironde is a former commune. It is found in the region Nouvelle- Aquitaine in the Gironde department in the southwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune Val-de-Virvée.Arrêté préfectoral 11 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Gironde
title: Salignac, Gironde
